phrases: The world has become a superhuman society,
and about 80 of the world's population now has some kind of special trait.
In this world swirling with chaos,
the profession that everyone once dreamed about and admired
came into the limelight.
Heroes of justice fighting villains and saving people from distress.
Yes, this is the story of how I became the greatest hero.
The first match of the first round of the finals tournament.
From the hero course, it is Izuku Midoriya!
Versus-
From general studies, it is Hitoshi Shinso!
The rules are simple.
Force your opponent out of bounds, or immobilize them!
You can also win by making your opponent say, I give up!
I give up, huh?
This is a fight to test the strength of your spirit.
If you know what you want for your future, then you cannot worry about appearances.
Ready?
That monkey was going on about his pride...
Start!
What did you say?!
I win.
I went through the trouble of warning him, too!
Hey, hey, what is the matter?
-Deku?!
-It is the important first match!
Liven things up!
-What in the world is going on?
-It is the important first match!
Liven things up!
Midoriya!
The match just started...
He is got a blank look on his face and is not moving a muscle!
Is this Shinso's Quirk?!
He did not stand out at all, but could he actually be someone amazing?
Victory or Defeat
Hitoshi Shinso from general studies
has gotten the better of Izuku Midoriya from the hero course!
Who would have imagined this?!
Will the bottom really overthrow the top?
That is why I said the entrance exam was not rational.
Huh?
What?
Here is some basic data on the two of them.
Since it is individual matches from here on out, I had someone compile it for me.
Hitoshi Shinso General Studies Class 1-C Nabooh Middle School
Shinso failed the practical exam for the hero course.
Since he also applied for general studies, he probably knew that would happen.
His Quirk is very powerful, but the practical exam consisted of fighting faux villains.
That gave an advantage to those with physical attack Quirks.
Shinso would not have been able to rack up any points with his Quirk.
You are lucky that you have been blessed, Izuku Midoriya.
Turn around and walk out of bounds.
Huh?
What?!
Midoriya's being so obedient!
Deku, why?
If you go out of bounds, then you will lose the match!
That Quirk is...
Hitoshi Shinso Quirk: Brainwashing
Hitoshi Shinso.
Quirk: Brainwashing!
Answering his question turns on a brainwashing switch in his opponent's brain,
forcing them to do what he says.
If he does not want the brainwashing switch to turn on, it will not!
In the fitness test on the first day of school,
Midoriya scored pretty low for the hero course,
but even in tests where he did not use his Quirk,
he did better than Shinso.
So if they fight normally, then Midoriya would win.
If he can just overcome Shinso's Brainwashing...
Well, either way, this will end quickly.
Young Midoriya!
Ahhh
You cannot come here!
No!
My body's moving on its own...
It is like... my head's filled with fog...
No!
Damn it!
Stop!
Stop!
Even though...
Even though Ojiro warned me...
Crap!
Waiting Room
Damn it!
A Quirk that can control people, huh?
Is not that too strong to beat?
Yeah, but you can probably avoid if you know about it.
I do not remember much after I answered his question.
I think that is how it works.
So if I answer without thinking, then I will lose right away.
No, but it is not completely impenetrable.
I said I barely remembered anything until almost the end, right?
When we were running away after Shinso stole Tetsutetsu's headband,
It looks like I ran into one of the horses on Team Tetsutetsu.
That is when I snapped out of it.
I remember what happened clearly after that.
So receiving a shock can get rid of it?
It is very likely.
Even so, I do not know what level of shock you need,
and in a one-on-one match, you cannot count on outside forces like that.
Anyway, that is about all I can tell you.
Thanks!
That was amazing!
I am going to say something selfish...
Ojiro...
Damn it...
This...
Even though...
In a place like this...
Like this...!
What... is... this?!
Mov...
You probably do not understand,
but even with a Quirk like this, I have my own dream.
Now, lose for me.
Th-This is...!
Midoriya's stopped!
Midoriya!
I am... I am so glad!
His fingers are...
Did he remove the brainwashing by making them explode?
That is crazy...
Why?
You should not be able to move freely!
What did you do?
I am the one who discharged my fingers.
But I was not the one who moved them.
What happened?
People I did not know came to mind,
and for a second, my mind was clear!
That was...
One For All.
Passed on to me like a sacred torch.
The people...
The presence of the people who spun together this power...
Did they save me?
Is that even possible?
What did you do?!
Even if I think about it now, I will not find the answer.
Later...
Thinking can come later!
He will not answer...
Did he figure out my secret?
No, he should have heard from that monkey from the beginning.
All I can do is make him talk again...
Say something.
You can produce that much power just by moving your fingers?
I am jealous.
I felt the same way in the past.
Thanks to my Quirk, I have been behind from the start.
Someone who is been blessed like you cannot understand, can you?
I do understand.
But, it is true...
I have been blessed.
Someone like you who was born with the ideal Quirk!
Someone who can reach your goal!
I have been blessed by others!
That is why!
Say something!
I cannot...
Is he trying to push me out?
You have got to be kidding!
You get out!
I cannot lose...!
Shinso is out of bounds!
Midoriya advances to round two!
Three Years Ago
Nabooh City Middle School
Wow, Shinso, your Quirk is Brainwashing?
Seriously?
That is amazing!
I have never heard of that before!
I am so jealous...
I cannot believe you can control anyone!
You can do as much bad stuff as you want!
No one'd know it was you.
Do not control us, okay?
Everyone says that.
Of course, if someone else had it, the first thing
I would think is that they would use it for evil, too.
Criminal...
It is good for being a villain, huh?
I am used to people insinuating that about me.
That is just what the world is like.
But you know...
But...
In the finals, the first person to advance to the second round
is Izuku Midoriya from Class A!
I was so nervous!
Turning the tables at the last moment!
As expected of Midoriya!
He did that shoulder toss on you before, too, did not he?
Shut up, Dunce Face.
That damn...
He was definitely aiming for it!
He led him right into it!
Using his power on part of his body like at the fitness test
and the throw from the combat training...
Rather than calling it the best use of his experience,
it is like he is using any experience he can to force the flow to change in his favor.
Izuku Midoriya
Yahoo!
That was kind of a boring first match,
but we should praise them both for a bravely fought match.
Clap your hands!
Someone who is been blessed like you cannot understand, can you?
Someone who can reach your goal!
Shinso, why do you want to be a hero?
But you know...
You cannot help the things you long for.
I felt the same way before I inherited One For All.
But...
No matter what I say right now...
You were really cool, Shinso!
Good job!
I was really surprised!
You are the star of general studies!
You put up a great fight against the guy who placed first in the obstacle course!
Besides-
That Quirk would work quite well against villains.
I wish I had it.
Well, they have got a ton of people applying, so some things just cannot be helped.
It was the difference in combat experience, huh?
Yeah, it ends up making a big difference.
What a waste.
You hear that, Shinso?
You are amazing!
Depending on the results, they will consider our transfer into the hero course.
Remember that.
Even if it did not work this time, I definitely will not give up.
I will get into the hero course, get certified,
and I will definitely become a better hero than you guys!
Yeah!
He got me!
Even though the match is over, what is he...?
People are usually wary when they talk to me, though...
At this rate, someone'll trip you up in no time.
At least...
Shinso...
I will not!
Recovery Girl's Temporary Nurse's Office
Kiss!
That should do it.
In the match with Shinso, I could not smile at all.
Well, his cries hit close to home for you, huh?
But that did not mean that I could lose.
That is what it means to aim for number one, right?
Poor thing.
You put some weird pressure on him again, did not you?
It was necessary!
Ouch.
Oh yeah, All Might.
I had a vision...
There were eight or nine people...
I am not sure exactly how many...
But when it felt like my mind was filled with fog from the brainwashing,
the vision appeared, as if to drive away the fog.
It was like I was barely able to move just my fingertips for a moment...
There was someone with eyes like you, too, All Might.
Was it... the people who had inherited One For All who did it?
Scary...
What the heck?
What?
I thought you would know about it!
No, I also saw it before, in my younger days.
It is a clear sign that you have got a better grasp on One For All.
What does that mean?
I think it is like a trace of something they left behind in One For All.
It is not something with intent that can interfere with you,
and you cannot interfere with them.
In other words, that vision is not what got rid of the brainwashing.
It was that when you saw the vision,
your strong emotions allowed you to overcome Young Shinso's Brainwashing
for just long enough to move your fingertips, I think.
That explanation's not satisfying at all, though...
Do not get too hung up about it!
More importantly, do not you need to go see who you will fight next?
Recovery Girl's Temporary Nurse's Office
Thank you both very much!
Goodbye!
You... were there, too, he said.
That is a good thing.
Player Waiting Room 2
Midoriya won, huh?
You are in my way.
You are acting disgracefully, Shoto.
If you used the power in your left side,
you would have had an overwhelming victory in the
obstacle course and the cavalry battle.
Stop this childish rebellion already.
You have a duty to surpass All Might.
Do you understand?
You are different from your siblings.
You are the greatest masterpiece!
Is that all you can say, bastard?
I will win and advance with just Mom's power.
I will not use your power when I fight.
Even if that works for now,
you will soon reach the limits of that power.
Oh, Deku!
Good work!
We saved a seat for you!
Thanks.
Thanks for waiting!
Next up is... these guys!
Shoto Todoroki Hanta Sero
He is good!
He is good, but what is with that plainness he just cannot get rid of?
From the hero course, it is Hanta Sero!
That is mean.
Versus-
Taking second, then first in the prelims!
You are way too strong, kid!
He was not recommended for admission for nothing!
Also from the hero course, it is Shoto Todoroki!
And now, for the second match of the finals-
-Ready...
Start!
-Well, I do not feel like I can win...
A surprise attack aimed to push his opponent out of bounds!
Do not you think that was the best choice for this situation?!
Seriously, get him, Sero!
Sorry.
Wh-What was that?
What is this vibration?
What is that?
Do not...
Do not you think that is a bit much?
Sero, can you move?
O-Of course not...
Ow...
Sero is immobilized!
Todoroki advances to the second round!
D-Do not worry about it...
Do not worry about it!
-Do not worry about it!
-Do not worry about it!
Do not worry about it!
Sorry, I went overboard.
I was angry.
Under the eyes of the crowd that started shouting Do not worry about it unprompted
was Todoroki, melting what he would frozen himself with his left hand.
For some reason...
Preview
The preview is here!
The YOU.A. sports festival finals tournament!
The sixteen players in it clash with their Quirks and their pride!
There is only a slight difference between winning and losing!
Even so-
The only ones who can win
are those who train diligently every day
and hang on to their dream of becoming a hero!
Do your best, you zygotes!
Next time, Battle on, Challengers!
Young Iida is manipulated by a girl and is completely humiliated!
Next time: Battle on, Challengers!
Go beyond!
Plus Ultra!
